explains: n. <正式> 决定性因素，决定条件；决定子，因子；行列式，方阵
wordGroup: determinant factor 决定因素；[石油]行列式因子

sentences.en: Put more strongly, technology can be a primary determinant of social and managerial organization.
sentences.cn: 更强硬地说，技术可以是社会和管理组织的主要决定因素。

sentences.en: The ruling, though it may yet be reversed, sets aside the principle that biology is the primary determinant of parentage.
sentences.cn: 这一裁决虽然可能会被推翻，但它无视“生物学是亲子关系的主要决定因素”这一原则。

sentences.en: Early child development (ECD), in turn is a life long determinant of health, well-being, and learning skills.
sentences.cn: 儿童早期发育，转而就会成为一生健康、福祉和学习技能的决定因素。
